overview:
Masa Nakatsu is the Founder and CEO of Musavy, which he started with Co-Founders, Takenori Sato and Yusuke Ito in March 2011.

He leads the team of the Musavy, being specialized in UX&UI Design, Programming, and Business Development. He loves design with simplicity and deep user engagement.

His favorite programming language is python and Objective-C in front-end and JAVA in back-end.

Previously, he was Product Manager of new business and system development in social commerce and digital contents in Seven Net Shopping (http://www.7netshopping.jp/all/), 4th largest e-commerce in Japan with over 10m customers and a Seven Eleven Japan Company.
